events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit me properly.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to a return and refund request regarding a purchased item.
The case was assigned to customer service representative Sarah L. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm happy to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new and unworn, with all the tags still attached.
Thank you for the info. We will provide you with a prepaid return label to send the jacket back, and once received, we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds great, thank you very much for your quick response and help with this return.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and to see if you require any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped off the package yesterday. Thanks again for your help throughout this process!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is appreciated!
We are closing the case now. Please contact us if you need any further help in the future.
Case has been archived after successful resolution and closure with full customer satisfaction.
